titleStmt.title: The imperfect promulgation of the Gospel consider'd a sermon preach'd in the Church of St. Mary le Bow, January 7, 1699/1700 : being an appendix to the lectures of the last year appointed by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq. / by Samuel Bradford.
titleStmt.author: Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
